roleset.name: make chugging noises
roleset.note: CHUG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'chug' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from chug.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: falter, etc.
example.text: The engine of John's car chugged loudly.

roleset.name: drink rapidly
roleset.note: CHUG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'chug' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from chug.02-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: move laboriously
roleset.note: CHUG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'chug' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from chug.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: chugga chugga
example.text: Batch processing is the high-volume, single-job data processing that most mainframes typically chug through *trace* at night, such as updating accounts at banks.

example.name: potatoes
example.text: Tractors chugged through rich fields with their wagons full of seed potatoes.
example.arg: with their wagons full of seed potatoes

example.name: with destinations
example.text: The door slammed behind Max, and the truck chugged to a small outbuilding.
